Sleep Like Sushi

Sleep like Sushi is a youtube channel by Katsu Suda featuring videos of Mr Wasabi and his Sushi friends, with musical compositions focusing on the sounds of Japan.

Katsu needed a channel brand identity, as well as an opening sequence for his videos.
